title: Far Cry 6 IS Political - Kinda Funny Games Daily 06.01.21
description:
Gary Whitta and Greg talk about why games getting political is great.

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:06:53 - Housekeeping
My Mom’s on the Kinda Funny Podcast today! Come hear about my old comic strips, the copyright I forgot about, and Nick’s best jokes directed at my high school dance photos. youtube.com/kindafunny
Yesterday, Rog put up an AMAZING edit of our Knockout City match with the devs. Check it out on youtube.com/kindafunnygames
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Donavan Harkness & Black Jack
The Roper Report  -
00:11:35 - OK, OK -- Far Cry 6 IS Political
00:31:00 - First Look at Cate Blanchet as Lilith in Borderlands Movie
00:33:30 - Pre-E3/Summer Games Fest Dates!
00:36:38 - NVIDIA’s New Cards, Hayley Williams @ GameSpot
00:40:25 - PlayStation’s Public EVO Tourneys, Jordan Oloman @ IGN
00:45:30 - Ad
00:48:30 - Out today
00:57:20 - Squad Up: goldenclyde65 (PSN)
00:58:30 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts:Blessing and Andy
